name: UIPadding
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Applies padding to the borders of the parent Class.GuiObject.
description: |
  Class.UIPadding applies padding to the borders of the parent
  Class.GuiObject, either as a pixel amount (Datatype.UDim.Offset|Offset) or
  percentage of the parent's size (Datatype.UDim.Scale|Scale).
